Oh, my God. Wesley?

-[police siren] -Kaylie! [crying]

Kaylie and I, we're gonna go,

No-No-No. I'm obviously not describing him right. Um...

Oh, my God.
-I'm so sorry. -I'm good.

Okay.

[sighs] How can I help you two?

-I'm so sorry. -No, you're all good. It's okay.

-Yes. -When you both clock
something insane is happening,

-Sean, his stuff is-- Go! -Okay!
Chill.
I know you're wondering if this is a good idea, and the answer is:

Oh, my God! Learn to drive! Stop!
Jesus.
-You okay? -I'm good. We're okay.
[grunts] It's like the fucking car is giving birth to me.

Sean, push the car!

Sean, help me flip the car. Come on!

-in moments of crisis. -This is a crisis?

-Come on. On the count of three. -Okay! Okay, okay.
-Okay. -One, two, three.
-[effort grunts] Fuck! -Fuck.
-Fuck you, jeep! Fuck you! -Hey, chill.

We have no idea where we are-- Why are you laughing?

-And where the hell are we? -I don't know where we are.
-We'll figure it out. Hey. -Oh, my God.

translation.en: Hey, look at me.
We're gonna be fine.
[sighs] What are we gonna do?
[sighs] We walk.
Come on.
We walk.

Feel the softness of the air as it flows through your bodily vessel.

translation.en: grounding you.

translation.en: You're like a kid, kind of. Not in a bad way.

translation.en: What I'm saying is, you have a very youthful soul, you know?
translation.de: Was ich meine, ist, du hast ein erfrischendes Gemüt, weißt du?

translation.en: Wanna hear something crazy? I used to be in corporate finance.
translation.de: Willst du was Verrücktes hören? Ich war mal im Finanzsektor.

translation.en: -That's very weird. -Yeah.
[chuckles] Very weird fit.
Not for me. But eventually, I followed my passion, and...
translation.de: Nicht für mich. Schließlich folgte ich meiner Leidenschaft und...

translation.en: that's not really working out either.
I don't know what to do.
Come on, now, Wes,
eventually you'll find that one place that appreciates you for you.

translation.en: Yeah, if that place even exists.
translation.de: Ja, wenn es die denn gibt.

translation.en: [sighs] Don't worry so much, Wes.

translation.en: The world will catch up to you.
Wait, wait, wait.
Oh, my God. Is that the van?
translation.de: Oh Gott, ist das der Van?

translation.en: That van has Jared's bag in it.
He's playing in a band?
What is happening?
Ah, it's a quinceañera.
It's like a Mexican sweet 16, only she's 15.
It's a combination of the words, "quince," meaning "15,"
you understand? And "años," meaning "years."
I know what a quinceañera is, Sean.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was das ist, Sean.

translation.en: -You know what that is? -Why's he at the quinceañera?
-He's supposed to be at the airport. -I don't know, he's hopping out of a cake.
translation.de: -Er sollte am Flughafen sein. -Er springt aus der Torte?

translation.en: I do not know this man.
Dude, come on. We gotta find out what the driver's doing here.

translation.en: I wonder if they got tacos in there.
translation.de: Ich frage mich, ob sie Tacos haben.

translation.en: That's really not important right now.
It's the most important thing I can think of.
Another hot pile of horseshit.
A little background. Kaylie.
Came here from Los Angeles. My dreams were crushed today,
translation.de: Aus Los Angeles. Meine Träume wurden zerstört.

translation.en: so I'm feeling a little tender.
I'm gonna be hosting a class by the aqueduct tomorrow morning called:
translation.de: Ich gebe morgen einen Kurs am Aquädukt namens:

translation.en: "Losers never win, you can eat shit all day,
translation.de: "Verlierer gewinnen nie, sie fressen den ganzen Tag Scheiße,

translation.en: and it's not ever gonna taste any better."
Fuck you. Fuck you.
You can just stop staring at me right now. Please stop. Stop smiling.
translation.de: Sie können aufhören... mich anzustarren. Bitte, hören Sie auf. Nicht mehr lächeln.

translation.en: You have a beautiful soul. Let it out.
translation.de: Sie haben einen schönen Geist. Zeigen Sie ihn.

translation.en: -I don't know what's happening. -You're feeling your feelings, Brooke.
Our hearts are talking through my hand.
[breathes heavily] Oh, my God.
Oh, my God, I'm sorry. [sniffles]
I'm so sorry, I can't...
uh, stop crying, I'm sor-- I just-- I didn't sleep a lot.
You're crying because your marriage is over.
translation.de: Sie beweinen das Ende Ihrer Ehe.

translation.en: No, you just saw the indentation where my wedding ring used to be.
translation.de: Nein. Sie sahen nur den Abdruck meines Eherings.

translation.en: That doesn't mean that my marriage is over.
It is.
You know it already, but you haven't let yourself feel it.
translation.de: Sie wissen es, aber erlaubten sich nicht, es zu fühlen.

translation.en: Pain and sadness, it's uncomfortable for you.
translation.de: Schmerz und Trauer sind Ihnen unangenehm.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Anger feels safer.
-It does. -Beware, beautiful Brooke,
that rage fuels you now, but it will destroy you,
translation.de: die Wut treibt Sie an, aber sie zerstört Sie.

translation.en: and it would destroy the life of your child.
-You love him so much, it's so-- -I love my son.
translation.de: -Sie lieben ihn so sehr... -Ich liebe meinen Sohn.

translation.en: But you have to love yourself first.
-You have to love your inner child. -I have to love myself.
translation.de: -Lieben Sie Ihr inneres Kind. -Ich muss mich lieben.

translation.en: Love baby Brooke. Do you know where she is right now?
translation.de: Lieben Sie Baby Brooke. Wissen Sie, wo sie ist?

translation.en: God, baby Brooke. I have to love her. Where is she?
translation.de: Ich muss sie lieben. Wo ist sie?

translation.en: You need to take care of her.
She wants an ice-cream cone. [chuckles]
She wants to run outside in a field of daisies. [chuckles]

translation.en: And I think baby Brooke really wants to get fucked. [sighs]
translation.de: Und ich glaube, Baby Brook will unbedingt gebumst werden.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Oh, wow.
Good news. I just spoke to Carlotta, the owner of the hacienda.

translation.en: -It's all taken care of. -It is?
She hooked it up. So, her brother, the driver,
he's gonna take us to the airport when he's done.
translation.de: bringt uns zum Flughafen, wenn er fertig ist.

translation.en: -Thank you. -And in a couple of hours,
you get to be Mrs. Jared What-the-fuck.
-[clink] -Sterling. Cannot wait.
-Oh, it's okay, señor. We don't need-- -No, we're good.
translation.de: -Schon gut. Wir brauchen kein... -Doch, tun wir.

translation.en: -Sean, we're not guests here. -Oh, speak for yourself. [chomps]
Carlotta said to eat. In fact, your non-eating is offending her.
translation.de: Carlotta sagte, wir sollen essen, sonst ist sie beleidigt.

translation.en: -Okay, fine. -You ain't gotta be that mad.
-Okay. -Take a bite.
-Oh, my God. -It's good, right?
-It's really good. What is that? -It's crickets.
-[spits] What? -Yeah.
-Crickets on the top. -Why would you let me eat that?
-The chapulines? -Oh, God. I'm gonna kill you.
Wow. You know, such a classy date.
Oh, like you were such a better date.
translation.de: Als wärst du so viel besser.

translation.en: Well, excuse me.
Why don't you show me how it's done, Coach?
translation.de: Dann zeig doch, wie es geht.

translation.en: You want me to show you how to be on a date?
-I gotta get back out there. -I will train you.

translation.en: -Oh, you're gonna train me? Okay. -Ah, huh.
-Wesley Darya. -Sean McGuire. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you, Sean.
Why are we shaking for so long?
I don't know. It's your training, Coach.

translation.en: So, what do you do? I just realized I don't even know.

translation.en: Oh, architect.
-Architect? Oh, my God. That's awesome. -Yeah. Thank you.
translation.de: -Architekt? Oh mein Gott, das ist toll. -Ja. Danke.

Me too.
So, what are you working on now?
Nothing.
Oh, just taking a break?
I guess you could say that. I...
Well, ever since Rachel died, I have taken a leave of absence, and I just haven't gone back.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Since then?
Yeah, it's been a while.
I'm so sorry.
That's gotta be really hard.
Yeah. But you know...
gotta get back out there. At least, that's what my friends say.
translation.de: ...ich muss wieder anfangen. Sagen meine Freunde.

translation.en: They're all worried about me, so that's why I'm here.

translation.en: What do you think?
I think...
I think I'm doing the best I can. [chuckles]

translation.en: Hey, do you wanna dance?
I am not a dancer. I should start with that.
translation.de: Ich bin keine gute Tänzerin. Nur als Vorwarnung.

translation.en: -Okay. -But I would love to dance with you.
-Oh, here we go. -Let's go. [chuckles]
-Goodness. Okay. -Over here.
Oh, boy.
What is that? [laughing]
Come on.
Come on.
Yes, Sean!
How are you so good?
Can't believe you slept with my shaman.
Oh, my God. Everything is so clear to me now.
translation.de: Oh Gott, ich sehe jetzt alles so klar.

translation.en: I'm gonna leave Dave.
-I never liked him for you. -What?
translation.de: -Ich hielt ihn nie für eine gute Wahl. -Was?

translation.en: Yeah. He couldn't keep up with you, and so he resented you for it and tried to drag you down.
translation.de: Er konnte nicht mit dir mithalten, also versuchte er, dich kleinzuhalten.

translation.en: But that's not what the person you're with is supposed to do.
translation.de: Aber das sollte ein Partner nicht tun.

translation.en: -They're supposed to build you up. -Why did you never say anything?

translation.en: Because it's your thing to discover.
translation.de: Weil du das selbst lernen musst.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
I'm really sorry about today.
translation.de: Das mit heute tut mir leid.

translation.en: I just don't know what I'm gonna do. It's the one thing I've always wanted.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was ich tun soll. Ich wollte immer Kinder.

translation.en: And I know you don't like hearing this, but there are other ways.

Well, not if you wanna adopt an older kid. The foster care system can't place them.

translation.en: Tad's been talking about it.
-Oh, yeah? -I just can't believe
how fucking frustrating it is.
Why does it come so easily for everyone else? I'm just so sick of my body not working. I wanna fix it.

translation.en: And what if you can't fix it?
Don't you still deserve to be happy?
Kinda feels weird talking about all this stuff without Wesley here.

translation.en: Yeah, well, if Wesley were here, we wouldn't be talking about our stuff.

translation.en: -God, that's sad. -But true.
Yep. It's bad.
His dad is dead. Isn't that so sad?

translation.en: So, I just wanna be clear. You sent this to him?

translation.en: -Yes, I sent it. -On purpose?
With my friends. Yeah, very much on purpose.
Very crazy.
-Yeah, it's very crazy. -Yeah.
-You wanna know what I would do? -Sure.
You should let him read it.
-What? No. -I'd let him read it.
-I'm not letting him read it. -Yes!
Look, he's gotta like all sides of you.

translation.en: You don't wanna pop up with a little bit of crazy one day, and then, surprise! He's out.

translation.en: I know you think this guy doesn't know me very well, but just so you know, he knows...

translation.en: -he knows my essence. -Oh, he knows your essence?
Cool, cool, cool. [smacks lips] What is his favorite thing about you?

translation.en: So many things.
At some point, I'm sure he said, "Know what I love about you? You're..."

likes that I'm the last...
normal girl in LA.
Look, Wes. You are a lot of things, but normal definitely is not one of them.

That's very accurate.
If you ask me, maybe you should be with someone who loves that about you.

translation.en: All right.
Oh, my God. Wait, we're here.

Call me, text me, whatever you wanna do. I wanna know how this all plays out.

translation.en: Thanks for being there.
Yeah. This was fun.
I had so much fun with you. -I had a lot of fun. -Right?

translation.en: -Today was a fantastic day. -Thank you. Thank you.

translation.en: [chuckles] You took me on a journey. I'm not that adventurous.

translation.en: -[laughs] -I'm really not.
Well, I am a little manic, so...
I can appreciate that.
Thanks.
Okay.
-Yeah, I should go. -Um... Yeah.
Okay.
Hmm. Okay.
-Okay, bye. -Right, yeah.
Right, right, right, right...
You take it easy.
-Oh, my God. Jared! -Oh, hey.
-Hi! Are you okay? [kisses] -You made it. Hi!

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
I missed you. Finally. Thank you. Gracias.
Thank you.
-I'll take you to the gate myself, okay? -No, I can take him to the gate.

She's very attached to you. Let's get you to LA, huh?

translation.en: -[grunts] -Are you excited?
Back to civilization... -Back to civilization. Yes. -...and air conditioning.

do you think my phone has any charge in it?

-You shouldn't even be carrying stuff. -Just a little--
No, I'm fine--
-[impact grunts] Oh, my God. -I got that.
You should not be doing things
-like holding laptops. -Hey, Wes, there you are.

translation.en: -Look who made it to the airport. -Hello...
ladies. [clears throat]
I just got here from Los Angeles. This is Jared.

some acquaintances.
Hey, Jared.
-Jared got really hurt recently. -Yeah, this is not the usual getup.

-So great to see you guys. Okay. -So nice to meet you.

-...soon. -Literally don't remember -those girls. -Or not soon.

translation.en: -[groans] -Okay.
Why don't we get you another Percocet so you could pass out?

The doctors wouldn't prescribe it unless it was safe for you to...

translation.en: -Okay, well-- -take as much as you want.
-There you go. -Thank you.
Good night.
-Got it? -[sighs]
Oh, long time no see.
-Hello. -Hi.
-Have a safe flight. -You too.
Well, they sure pop up everywhere. [chuckles]
-Hey. -Yeah?
Babe, look over there.
[whispering] That guy.
What is he doing? That's crazy.

translation.en: -I don't know. It's just feet. -"It's just feet"?

-Don't make a big deal out of it. -Disgusting.
Okay? [shushes]
What?
[whispering] Jared?
Jared. -Hmm. -Jared.
Sorry. Are you awake?

translation.en: I-- What? Yes.
I'm really...
really worried about...
showing this to you, but I want you to know that, um... I wrote an e-mail...

translation.en: to you during those five days that you went missing

Have you started yet?
Oh, yeah.
-I know-- -Wow, this is just mean.
I know, I'm so sorry.
If we're gonna do this, you need to know

this e-mail is my worst.

This was me just one night
after you had disappeared for five days, and--

I have a mustache. [chuckling] This is the thing I'm talking about.

The good and the bad.
We don't have to pretend. We don't have to pretend to be perfect.

translation.en: No.
I want that girl.
This girl's... crazy.
Jared, don't do this. Come on.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Wait.
-Miss? -What are you doing?
Is there another seat open that...

translation.en: [whispers] Kaylie? Brooke?
I'm really sorry.
[over PA] Your attention, please. Baggage from flight 746

Baggage from flight 746 can be retrieved at carousel B.

translation.en: Sweetie, it's gonna be okay.
This fucking trip. What a mistake.

I mean, honestly, Jared has a ridiculous notion
translation.de: Im Ernst, Jared hat eine alberne Vorstellung davon,

we're just feeling a little neglected, that's all.

-[snickers] -"A little"?
Did she just say "a little"?
Wes, you've been obsessed to the point of blindness.

and Kaylie is adopting a baby.

That's all the time that it took because you weren't there,

They are worse.

I live it every day, okay?

translation.en: [groans] Oh, my God.
I can't. [sighs]

-Oh, come on. -We need a break.
-Fine, I'm sorry. -We're done.
Don't leave. How am I supposed to get home?
translation.de: Geht nicht. Wie komme ich nach Hause?

translation.en: You guys, all I have are pesos!
Wesley, hi. This is Doug Evans from Atwater Village Charter School.
translation.de: Wesley, hi. Doug Evans von der Atwater Village Charter-Schule.

translation.en: Uh, my good friend, Sean McGuire, recommended you
translation.de: Mein Freund Sean McGuire empfahl Sie

translation.en: for a guidance counselor position.
If you could please give me a call back. Thanks.
We were just a group of parents that were unhappy with how our school was being run.
translation.de: Wir waren ein paar Eltern, die unzufrieden mit der Schulleitung waren.

translation.en: So here we are, just trying to do it better ourselves.
translation.de: Jetzt versuchen wir, es besser zu machen.

translation.en: That is so cool that you're trying something new.
translation.de: So cool, dass Sie etwas Neues probieren.

translation.en: Really. Oh, I checked out the seventh-grade curriculum,

translation.en: and I had some thoughts. Um...
I was just thinking-- I mean, unless I'm overstepping.
translation.de: Ich dachte nur... Außer das geht zu weit.

translation.en: No. Not at all. That's why we hired you.
translation.de: Nein, gar nicht. Darum sind Sie hier.

translation.en: We want you here for your voice. I'm excited about your ideas.
translation.de: Sie sollen sich einbringen. Ich freue mich auf die Ideen.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Yeah.
And it looks like you already have guests in your office.
translation.de: Und Sie haben schon einen Besucher in Ihrem Büro.

translation.en: Sent her boyfriend a topless pic, and then...
translation.de: Schickte ihrem Freund ein Nacktfoto und...

translation.en: he forwarded it to the entire lacrosse team.
-Hi, Eden. -Hey.
-If you need me to, I can-- -I got this.
No. Technology mishaps are kinda my thing.
Thank you so much.
It's okay. Are you okay?
translation.de: Ist ja gut. Bist du ok?

translation.en: It's not a big deal.
My friends are just jealous that I have a boyfriend and they don't.
translation.de: Meine Freundinnen sind neidisch, weil ich einen Freund habe.

translation.en: Do you wanna know something about love? It can be fucked up!
translation.de: Soll ich dir etwas über Liebe verraten? Sie kann so abgefuckt sein.

translation.en: Don't tell anyone I said "fuck."
Yeah, I followed a dude to Mexico.

translation.en: I got arrested and electrocuted, and I'm currently not with this person.
translation.de: Ich wurde verhaftet, erlitt Stromschläge, und wir sind nicht zusammen.

translation.en: But your friends?
They're the ones who can help keep your head on straight.
translation.de: Die helfen dir, bei Verstand zu bleiben.

translation.en: 'Cause they know you, they're looking out for you.
translation.de: Die kennen dich. Sie passen auf dich auf.

translation.en: Trust me, boyfriends come and go,
but if you're lucky enough to have great friends,
translation.de: aber hast du das Glück, tolle Freundinnen zu haben...

translation.en: I would hold on to that.
What about you?
Do you have that?
Hey, Brooke. It's Wes. Um...
[smacks lips] I just...
I just wanted to call you and tell you I miss you so much. And...
translation.de: Ich wollte dir nur sagen, wie sehr ich dich vermisse. Und...

translation.en: see how you're doing, how you and Dave are doing.
translation.de: ...wissen, wie es... dir geht, wie es dir und Dave.

translation.en: I don't know if you've been to Kaylie's house recently,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob du in letzter Zeit bei Kaylie warst,

translation.en: but I'm in the area if you're around or wanna talk.
translation.de: aber ich bin in der Gegend, falls du da bist oder reden willst.

translation.en: I would really love that. I--
Brooke, I have to call you back.
Kevin, come here, buddy.
Oh, my God. [sighs]
Kevin!
Come here.
Come on, buddy. Help me out.

translation.en: Hey, Kevin, these are my nice pants.
translation.de: He, Kevin. Das sind meine guten Hosen.

translation.en: Kevin! Kevin!
She's getting her baby.
Oh, my God.
Kevin, you Nazi dick!
-Sweetie, what's-- Wesley? -What in the world was that?
translation.de: -Schatz, was ist... Wesley? -Was zur Hölle war das?

translation.en: Wesley? Kevin? Let me--
-He's very violent. -Sweetie.
Sorry, I was trying to rescue your cat.

translation.en: What's going on?
I know you're mad at me. And you probably don't want me here,
translation.de: Ihr seid wütend, und wollt mich nicht sehen,

translation.en: but if I could say something...
As I was chasing after Kevin,
I was thinking, why does this cat keep trying to escape?
translation.de: ...fragte ich mich, warum diese Katze ständig zu fliehen versucht.

translation.en: You know, you're the best parents he'll ever have.
translation.de: Wisst ihr, ihr seid die besten Eltern, die er haben könnte.

translation.en: I mean, really, he has a terrible personality
translation.de: Wirklich, er hat einen miesen Charakter

translation.en: and literally looks like Hitler,
translation.de: und sieht wirklich aus wie Hitler.

translation.en: and you guys feed him,
and you love him,
and you look after him. And then it dawned on me,
translation.de: ...und passt auf ihn auf. Dann fiel mir auf...

translation.en: I'm Kevin.
What? I...
I'm flawed and I'm complicated
translation.de: Ich habe Fehler und bin kompliziert,

translation.en: and maybe even a little broken,
but you guys love me without judgment.
I think I just felt like I was falling behind, and...

translation.en: if only I got my dude, I'd be okay. But--
translation.de: ...als wäre mit einem Kerl alles ok.

translation.en: -I get that. -I get that.
I don't need a dude to be okay.
translation.de: Mir geht es auch ohne einen Kerl gut.

translation.en: -And that has to do with the two of you. -Yeah.
And, much like Kevin, I feel like I've taken you for granted.
translation.de: Und genau wie Kevin hielt ich euch für selbstverständlich.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mm-hmm.
So, I'm sorry.
Sorry?
-Was-- Did she say, "I'm sorry"? -I couldn't hear.
I'm so sorry. I'm...
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid. Ich...

translation.en: begging you to forgive me. [sighs]
And I know that was a lot.
translation.de: Und ich weiß, das war viel.

translation.en: Ma'am, you must be so lost.
Please know that Kaylie and Tad are gonna take such good care of your baby.
translation.de: Kaylie und Tad werden sich so gut um Ihr Baby kümmern.

translation.en: -Putting the house on the market. -Just selling the house.

translation.en: I had a completely different narrative in my mind.

translation.en: Oh, my--
Hi. [chuckles] How are you?
Uh, hey. Um...
-You look great. -Thanks. So do you.
-What are you doing here? -I was looking at your Instagram.
translation.de: -Was machst du hier? -Ich sah dein Instagram-Profil

I know I'm probably not supposed to admit that,
but I'm trying to be honest and own my eccentricities.

translation.en: -Right. -And I thought I would come say hi.

translation.en: -Yeah, cool. -Where are your friends?
-Um, where are my friends? -Oh, my God.
This isn't a bad time, is it?
Yeah, you know, a little bit. I--

-What's this? Are we speed dating? -No. Um...
This is Wesley.
-Wesley-- we're old friends. -Yeah.
-And, this is Ellen, my... -Blind date.
-Yeah, that's pretty much-- -It's weird to say out loud.
-Yeah, someone set us up. -Oh, my gosh.
That's so awesome.
-Awesome. -She was like, "I know this nice guy."
And I was like, "Okay. I'm not doing anything [chuckles] on a Wednesday." So...
translation.de: Und ich so: "Ok, ich habe eh nichts vor." Also...

I should call my mom.

translation.en: -Oh, no. -You guys, sit.
You haven't seen each other in a long time.

translation.en: I hope her mom figures that out.

You recommended me for that Atwater job. Is that true?

translation.en: -This is true. -Thank you. I got it.
-I know. I know. -[chuckles]
Look, it's not a big deal. People come to me asking for guidance counselor recommendations all the time.

translation.en: Oh, they do?
Well, guidance counselors, drug dealers. Those two.
Thanks for recommending me for the first.
-Yes, I did. Yeah. -I will try to not get fired.
If you do, you can be a drug dealer.
-Oh, yay. -Yeah. [laughs]
[chuckles] You got options, girl.
-Oh, man. It's so good to see you. -Yeah, you too. Well...

What if we gave it a shot?
I like you too. I...
But?
Wes, I don't think I'm-- I don't think I'm there.

translation.en: This is casual.
What we had in Mexico was real.

Okay, I'm sorry I interrupted.
-Thanks, Sean. -Wes.
Hey.

basement's okay,

Like, on a date.
-[sighs] -Wes.

will you marry me?

Hey.
